attributes.action: Raise the motorway maximum speed to 100 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is madness that the average car in the UK can easily handle speeds above 100 mph but we are still limited to a speed of 70 mph. Surely car technology has progressed to a point where we can safely and responsibly drive at 100 mph?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
